decoworld.server

Class AuthActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • decoworld.server.AuthActor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor

    public class AuthActor
extends akka.actor.UntypedActor
    Actor for handling authentication requests. At the moment the intention is that these requests will be coming from the login manager.
